# LLM Usage Policy for EFT Library
# https://eftlibrary.com

User-Agent: *

# =========================
# Allowed informational content
# =========================
Allow: /map-of-tarkov/
Allow: /map/
Allow: /quest/
Allow: /roadmap
Allow: /planner

Allow: /boss
Allow: /hideout
Allow: /event
Allow: /patch-notes
Allow: /wipe
Allow: /notice

Allow: /price
Allow: /rank
Allow: /weapon
Allow: /ammo
Allow: /head-wear
Allow: /headset
Allow: /rig
Allow: /armor-vest
Allow: /backpack
Allow: /loot
Allow: /medical
Allow: /provisions
Allow: /container
Allow: /key
Allow: /glasses
Allow: /face-cover
Allow: /arm-band
Allow: /item

# =========================
# Disallowed user-generated content
# =========================
Disallow: /community

# =========================
# Usage policy
# =========================
Usage:
- Search indexing: Allowed
- Summarization: Allowed with attribution and link
- Question answering: Allowed with attribution
- Model training: Not allowed
- Commercial redistribution: Not allowed

Attribution:
- Site name: EFT Library
- URL: https://eftlibrary.com
